### Welcome to 85 movement picture archive

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```



### Background

85 movement is an important period in Chinese contemporary art. Showing the impact of western culture following China's opening and reform (Gao ,2008), numerous unofficial art groups appeared spontaneously from 1984 to 1986, leading 85 art new wave to this exuberant period in the history (Wu, 2010). As the participator and artist, Professor Gao experienced that movement, and fortunately, he holds a lot of first-hand information including artists' letters, conference letter, and photos of exhibitions. Most of them are organized in his book the 85 movement, an anthology of historical sources. I appreciate a lot that he admits me to use his work as row data to do my research.


### Structure of the picture order (index of pictures)

Type of pictures & Structure of the picture note

1) Document
example picture name: Xu Zhou modern art exhibition, Xu Zhou, 1986
structure: Document name, Place(some do not have, but can logically get from context), Time

2) Action
example picture name: Protest of the Stars Group,1979,Beijing(Wang Keping is holding the logo)
structure: Action name, Time, Description

3) Work
example picture name: Wang Keping, Silence, wood sculpture,1979
structure: Artist, Work name, Material, Time

### Data structure based on pictures' structure
There are 5 types of data which are stored into Neo4j

1) Document
attribute: 
document_id,type(document),document_place,document_topic(document name&description),picture_name

2) Action
attribute:
action_id,typeï¼ˆscenario, protest, photo),action_place,year,picture_name

3) Work
attribute:
work_id,type(work),work_name,work_material,year,artist_name,picture_name

4) Artist
attribute:
artist_name,artist_id

5) Exhibition
attribute:
exhibition_name,exhibition_id
